item.title: Portfolio

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
Hi! We are Skylith. Digital & Creative Agency.

An award-winning design and development team that is proud of our work.

We use an agile approach to test assumptions and connect with the needs of your audience early and often. Technology enables great experiences. We like and use technology but we have tried hard to not fall in love with it.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
We provide the best services 
in the industry

WEB & UI/UX DESIGN

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production of all web.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet.

SEO & MARKETING

A process of affecting the visibility of a website or a web page in a web search engine's unpaid results.

MOBILE DESIGN

As part of the development process, mobile UI design is also essential in the creation of mobile apps.

MOBILE DEVELOPMENT

Mobile development - term used to denote the act or process by which application software.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Graphic design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of illustration.

PRODUCT STRATEGY

While the product strategy outlines the elements of the product and the company's target market.

PHOTOGRAPHY

Photography is the science, art, application and practice of creating durable images by recording light.

Outstanding job and exceeded all expectations. It was a pleasure to work with them on a sizable first project and am looking forward to start the next one asap.

Michael Hopkins

Outstanding job and exceeded all expectations. It was a pleasure to work with them on a sizable first project and am looking forward to start the next one asap.

Michael Hopkins

Outstanding job and exceeded all expectations. It was a pleasure to work with them on a sizable first project and am looking forward to start the next one asap.

and medium sized projects.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
Contact Info

Let us know what you're looking for in an agency. We'll take a look and see if this could be the start of something beautiful. Please get in touch and lets schedule time to talk!

Phone

+44 987 065 908

Address

10111 Santa Monica Boulevard, LA

Email

info@skylith.com

item.title: Main
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
New Branding Agency

We create everything digital, printable,
minimal, visual and analytical.

[visual_portfolio id="206" class="ghostkit-custom-Z2une08"]

We are a new Branding Agency. Over 10 years of combined experience, and know a thing or two about designing websites and mobile apps. Clever use of technology and lean processes enable us to work faster and smarter.

hello@skylith.com

Currently accepting enquiries for small 
and medium sized projects.
